title: [ICE] Unresolved HRTB lifetime in APIT

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-nightly
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to nightly.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
This ICEs on nightly, but only errors in stable or beta: `fn test_argument_position(x: impl for<'a> Tr<'a, Assoc = impl Copy + 'a>) {}` [playground](https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=debug&edition=2021&gist=930b6f98572136f690e5da91c8f2ddc3) ### Code ```Rust trait Tr<'a> { type Assoc; } fn test_argument_position(x: impl for<'a> Tr<'a, Assoc = impl Copy + 'a>) {} fn main() {} ```
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued error: internal compiler error: Could not resolve lifetime(HirId { owner: DefId(0:6 ~ playground[24bf]::test_argument_position), local_id: 9 }: 'a) in scope Binder { lifetimes: {}, next_early_index: 2, track_lifetime_uses: true, opaque_type_parent: false, scope_type: Normal, hir_id: HirId { owner: DefId(0:6 ~ playground[24bf]::test_argument_position), local_id: 11, }, s: TraitRefBoundary { s: Binder { lifetimes: {}, next_early_index: 2, track_lifetime_uses: false, opaque_type_parent: true, scope_type: Normal, hir_id: HirId { owner: DefId(0:6 ~ playground[24bf]::test_argument_position), local_id: 0, }, s: Root, allow_late_bound: true, }, }, allow_late_bound: true, } --> src/main.rs:5:70 | 5 | fn test_argument_position(x: impl for<'a> Tr<'a, Assoc = impl Copy + 'a>) {} | ^^ | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_resolve/src/late/lifetimes.rs:2316:27 error: internal compiler error: unelided lifetime in signature --> src/main.rs:5:70 | 5 | fn test_argument_position(x: impl for<'a> Tr<'a, Assoc = impl Copy + 'a>) {} | ^^ | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_typeck/src/astconv/mod.rs:250:30 thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1369:13 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f076b75be7d - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h85cc47332f2b05a9 at /rustc/ecd44958e0a21110d09862ee080d95a4ca6c52f8/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7f076b75be7d - clone 30: 0x0 - note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.62.0-nightly (ecd44958e 2022-05-10) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type bin -C embed-bitcode=no -C codegen-units=1 -C debuginfo=2 note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack ```
